name: part_013
file: tmp_【#不知火フレア4周年記念LIVE】平成初期アニソン祭り【不知火フレア⧸ホロライブ】 [7lJ5kdZGFgk]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_013.mov

scenes.description: A cinematic landscape shot of a snowy coastal town under a bright, overcast sky.
The scene transitions to a summer-themed rural bus stop with flower petals floating in the breeze.

A static ending illustration of Shiranui Flare in a summer dress and straw hat, holding sunflowers against a backdrop of wind turbines and a blue sky. The instrumental track 'Natsukage' plays as an outro.
